groupDevices.description:
When the boolean argument groupDevices is set to __true__, then the analytics for all the
Sockets (usually two in high availability) are aggregated as one result.

For the best results for aggregated Sockets, we recommend that there is consistent
names and functionality (for example Destination) for the links on both Sockets.
groupDevices.name: groupDevices

groupInterfaces.description:
When the boolean argument groupInterfaces is set to __true__, then the data for all the
interfaces are aggregated to a single interface.
groupInterfaces.name: groupInterfaces

timeFrame.description: The time frame for the data that the query returns. The argument is in the format type.time value. This argument is mandatory.
timeFrame.name: timeFrame

description:
The accountMetrics query helps you analyze the state and quality of the connections
of sites and SDP users to the Cato Cloud. This data is for the traffic inside the DTLS
tunnel between the site and the Cato Cloud. accountMetrics shows historical metrics,
statics, and analytics for the account.
name: accountMetrics

buckets.description: number of buckets, defaults to 10, max 1000
buckets.name: buckets

groupDevices.description:
When the boolean argument groupDevices is set to __true__, then the analytics for all the
Sockets (usually two in high availability) are aggregated as one result.

For the best results for aggregated Sockets, we recommend that there is consistent
names and functionality (for example Destination) for the links on both Sockets.
groupDevices.name: groupDevices

groupInterfaces.description:
When the boolean argument groupInterfaces is set to __true__, then the data for all the
interfaces are aggregated to a single interface.
groupInterfaces.name: groupInterfaces

enumValues.name: tunnelAge

enumValues.description:
Packet loss from socket directly to a well known global services, not through Cato This is used to measure last
mile provider's performance, independent of the service.
enumValues.name: lastMilePacketLoss

Latency from socket directly to a well known global service, not through Cato. This is used to measure last

perSecond.description: whether to normalize the data into per second (i.e. divide by granularity)
perSecond.name: perSecond

siteIDs.description: A list of unique IDs for each site. If specified, only sites in this list are returned. Otherwise, all sites are returned.
siteIDs.name: siteIDs

timeFrame.description: The time frame for the data that the query returns. The argument is in the format type.time value. This argument is mandatory.
timeFrame.name: timeFrame

toRate.description: Normalize collected metrics as per-second values
toRate.name: toRate

useDefaultSizeBucket.description: In case we want to have the default size bucket (from properties)
useDefaultSizeBucket.name: useDefaultSizeBucket

userIDs.description: A list of unique IDs for each user. If specified, only users in this list are returned. Otherwise, no user metrics are returned.
userIDs.name: userIDs

withMissingData.description: If false, the data field will be set to '0' for buckets with no reported data. Otherwise it will be set to -1
withMissingData.name: withMissingData

granularity.description: The size of a single time bucket in seconds
granularity.name: granularity

sites___siteIDs.description: A list of unique IDs for each site. If specified, only sites in this list are returned. Otherwise, all sites are returned.
sites___siteIDs.name: siteIDs

sites.description: Site connectivity metrics for the requested sites.
sites.name: sites

flowCount.description: Timeseries with the number of flows (connections) in the site. Applicable only for site
flowCount.name: flowCount

data___perSecond.name: perSecond

data___useDefaultSizeBucket.name: useDefaultSizeBucket

data___withMissingData.name: withMissingData

data.description:
Data is an array of tuples, each containing two values:  [timestamp, metric], where the timestamp is in
milliseconds from the epoch (1.1.1970), and the metric is a number (according to the unit type)
data.name: data

dimensions.description: List of dimension values for this timeseries
dimensions.name: dimensions

info.description: Specific information about the timeseries, used to build its name, title etc
info.name: info

key.description: Timeseries key: measure and dimension values
key.name: key

dimensions.description: List of dimension key-value pair for this timeseries key
dimensions.name: dimensions

label.description: Indicates the type of the timeseries
label.name: label

sum.description: Summary of the metrics over the given time frame
sum.name: sum

units.description:
Identifies what unit of data this timeseries represents. Note that toRate is only available for particular types
of data to make sense.
units.name: units

enumValues.name: seconds

info.description: Shows general information about the site (array with nested fields). Applicable only for site
info.name: info

address.description: Address of the physical site location
address.name: address

cityName.description: City of the physical site location
cityName.name: cityName

connType.description: The Connection Type field defines how the site connects to the Cato Cloud, such as X1500 Socket or AWS vSocket (array with nested fields)
connType.name: connType

countryCode.description: Code for the Country that is the physical location of the site
countryCode.name: countryCode

countryName.description: Country that is the physical location of the site
countryName.name: countryName

countryStateName.description: State of the country that is the physical site location
countryStateName.name: countryStateName

creationTime.description: Timestamp for when the site was created
creationTime.name: creationTime

description.description: User defined description of the site
description.name: description

interfaces.description: Basic configuration information about the Socket interface
interfaces.name: interfaces

destType.description: The destination type configured to the Socket interface
destType.name: destType

downstreamBandwidth.description: Maximum allowed bandwidth for traffic on this port, from the Cato Cloud to the site
downstreamBandwidth.name: downstreamBandwidth

downstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision.description: Maximum allowed bandwidth for traffic on this port in MBPS with single decimal point, from the Cato Cloud to the site
downstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision.name: downstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision

id.description: ID for the Socket port in the Socket WebUI Monitor tab
id.name: id

name.description: Name for the port in the Cato Management Application
name.name: name

upstreamBandwidth.description: Maximum allowed bandwidth on this port, for traffic from the site to the Cato Cloud
upstreamBandwidth.name: upstreamBandwidth

upstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision.description: Maximum allowed bandwidth on this port in MBPS with single decimal point, for traffic from the site to the Cato Cloud
upstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision.name: upstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision

ipsec.description: data related to IPsec sites, such as IKE version
ipsec.name: ipsec

catoIP.description: The source IP address for the IPsec tunnel in the Cato Cloud
catoIP.name: catoIP

ikeVersion.description: Shows 1 for IKEv1 and 2 for IKEv2
ikeVersion.name: ikeVersion

isPrimary.description: For HA configurations, when this boolean value is true, this the primary IPsec firewall or routing device
isPrimary.name: isPrimary

remoteIP.description: The destination IP address for the IPsec tunnel (in the site)
remoteIP.name: remoteIP

isHA.description: When this boolean value is true, the site is enabled for high availability
isHA.name: isHA

region.description: Geographical PoP region that the site is licensed to use

sockets.description: Data related to Socket and vSocket sites, such as serial number and Socket version (array with nested fields)
sockets.name: sockets

version.description: Software version number that is currently installed on the Socket
version.name: version

versionUpdateTime.name: versionUpdateTime

type.description: Site type in the Cato Management Application, such as branch office or datacenter
type.name: type

interfaces.description: Analytics that are returned for the links for a site
interfaces.name: interfaces

annotations.name: annotations

charts to attach to it.

enumValues.name: generic

enumValues.name: lastMilePacketLoss

enumValues.description:
Latency from socket directly to a well known global service, not through Cato. This is used to measure last
mile provider's performance, independent of the service.

data___withMissingData.name: withMissingData

data.description:
Data is an array of tuples, each containing two values:  [timestamp, metric], where the timestamp is in
milliseconds from the epoch (1.1.1970), and the metric is a number (according to the unit type)

dimensions.name: dimensions

info.name: info

dimensions.name: dimensions

label.name: label

Identifies what unit of data this timeseries represents. Note that toRate is only available for particular types
of data to make sense.

info.description: Shows general information about the site (array with nested fields). Applicable only for site
info.name: info

address.description: Address of the physical site location
address.name: address

cityName.description: City of the physical site location
cityName.name: cityName

connType.description: The Connection Type field defines how the site connects to the Cato Cloud, such as X1500 Socket or AWS vSocket (array with nested fields)
connType.name: connType

countryCode.description: Code for the Country that is the physical location of the site
countryCode.name: countryCode

countryName.description: Country that is the physical location of the site
countryName.name: countryName

countryStateName.description: State of the country that is the physical site location
countryStateName.name: countryStateName

creationTime.description: Timestamp for when the site was created
creationTime.name: creationTime

description.description: User defined description of the site
description.name: description

interfaces.description: Basic configuration information about the Socket interface
interfaces.name: interfaces

destType.description: The destination type configured to the Socket interface
destType.name: destType

downstreamBandwidth.description: Maximum allowed bandwidth for traffic on this port, from the Cato Cloud to the site
downstreamBandwidth.name: downstreamBandwidth

downstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision.description: Maximum allowed bandwidth for traffic on this port in MBPS with single decimal point, from the Cato Cloud to the site
downstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision.name: downstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision

id.description: ID for the Socket port in the Socket WebUI Monitor tab
id.name: id

name.description: Name for the port in the Cato Management Application
name.name: name

upstreamBandwidth.description: Maximum allowed bandwidth on this port, for traffic from the site to the Cato Cloud
upstreamBandwidth.name: upstreamBandwidth

upstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision.description: Maximum allowed bandwidth on this port in MBPS with single decimal point, for traffic from the site to the Cato Cloud
upstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision.name: upstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision

ipsec.description: data related to IPsec sites, such as IKE version
ipsec.name: ipsec

catoIP.description: The source IP address for the IPsec tunnel in the Cato Cloud
catoIP.name: catoIP

ikeVersion.description: Shows 1 for IKEv1 and 2 for IKEv2
ikeVersion.name: ikeVersion

isPrimary.description: For HA configurations, when this boolean value is true, this the primary IPsec firewall or routing device
isPrimary.name: isPrimary

remoteIP.description: The destination IP address for the IPsec tunnel (in the site)
remoteIP.name: remoteIP

isHA.description: When this boolean value is true, the site is enabled for high availability
isHA.name: isHA

region.description: Geographical PoP region that the site is licensed to use
region.name: region

sockets.description: Data related to Socket and vSocket sites, such as serial number and Socket version (array with nested fields)
sockets.name: sockets

isPrimary.description: For HA configurations, when this boolean value is true, this the primary Socket
isPrimary.name: isPrimary

version.description: Software version number that is currently installed on the Socket
version.name: version

versionUpdateTime.description: Timestamp when the Socket upgraded to the current hardware version
versionUpdateTime.name: versionUpdateTime

type.description: Site type in the Cato Management Application, such as branch office or datacenter
type.name: type

interfaces.description: Analytics that are returned for the links for a site
interfaces.name: interfaces

annotations.description: Time stamp annotation that shows a time increment for a GUI
annotations.name: annotations

definition.description: An object for marking specific events in time.

type.description:
Type identifies which annotation this is: e.g. connectivity, rolechange, missingdata, which allows
charts to attach to it.
type.name: type

enumValues.description: The site connects to a different PoP
enumValues.name: popChange

enumValues.description: Change for HA status role
enumValues.name: roleChange

enumValues.description: The ISP IP address (remote IP) changed
enumValues.name: remoteIPChange

enumValues.description: Other events that are included in annotations
enumValues.name: generic

definition.name: TimeAnnotation

interfaceInfo.description: Basic configuration information about the Socket interface . Applicable only for site
interfaceInfo.name: interfaceInfo

destType.description: The destination type configured to the Socket interface
destType.name: destType

downstreamBandwidth.description: Maximum allowed bandwidth for traffic on this port, from the Cato Cloud to the site
downstreamBandwidth.name: downstreamBandwidth

downstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision.description: Maximum allowed bandwidth for traffic on this port in MBPS with single decimal point, from the Cato Cloud to the site
downstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision.name: downstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision

id.description: ID for the Socket port in the Socket WebUI Monitor tab
id.name: id

name.description: Name for the port in the Cato Management Application
name.name: name

upstreamBandwidth.description: Maximum allowed bandwidth on this port, for traffic from the site to the Cato Cloud
upstreamBandwidth.name: upstreamBandwidth

upstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision.description: Maximum allowed bandwidth on this port in MBPS with single decimal point, for traffic from the site to the Cato Cloud
upstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision.name: upstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision

ipsecInfo.description: Data related to IPsec sites, such as IKE version . Applicable only for site
ipsecInfo.name: ipsecInfo

catoIP.description: The source IP address for the IPsec tunnel in the Cato Cloud
catoIP.name: catoIP

ikeVersion.description: Shows 1 for IKEv1 and 2 for IKEv2
ikeVersion.name: ikeVersion

isPrimary.description: For HA configurations, when this boolean value is true, this the primary IPsec firewall or routing device
isPrimary.name: isPrimary

remoteIP.description: The destination IP address for the IPsec tunnel (in the site)
remoteIP.name: remoteIP

metrics___toRate.description: Normalize collected metrics as per-second values
metrics___toRate.name: toRate

bytesDownstream.description: total downstream traffic (from the Cato Cloud to the site)
bytesDownstream.name: bytesDownstream

bytesUpstream.description: total upstream traffic (from the site to the Cato Cloud)
bytesUpstream.name: bytesUpstream

duration.description: total amount of time for the site data
duration.name: duration

flowCount.description:
The number of flows (connections) in the tunnel. Relevant only for per site Metrics, ignored in per-interface
metrics.
flowCount.name: flowCount

granularity.description: duration in seconds for a single metrics bucket
granularity.name: granularity

hostCount.description: The number of hosts in the tunnel. Relevant only for per site Metrics, ignored in per-interface metrics.
hostCount.name: hostCount

hostLimit.description:
The configurable limit of the number of hosts in the tunnel. Relevant only for per site Metrics, ignored in
per-interface metrics.
hostLimit.name: hostLimit

jitterDownstream.description: jitter for downstream traffic (difference in time delay in milliseconds (ms) between data packets)
jitterDownstream.name: jitterDownstream

jitterUpstream.description: jitter for upstream traffic (difference in time delay in milliseconds (ms) between data packets)
jitterUpstream.name: jitterUpstream

lostDownstream.description: number of packets lost for downstream traffic
lostDownstream.name: lostDownstream

lostDownstreamPcnt.description: percent of packet loss for downstream traffic
lostDownstreamPcnt.name: lostDownstreamPcnt

lostUpstream.description: number of packets lost for upstream traffic
lostUpstream.name: lostUpstream

lostUpstreamPcnt.description: percent of packet loss for upstream traffic
lostUpstreamPcnt.name: lostUpstreamPcnt

packetsDiscardedDownstream.description: total packets discarded for downstream traffic
packetsDiscardedDownstream.name: packetsDiscardedDownstream

packetsDiscardedUpstream.description: total packets discarded for upstream traffic
packetsDiscardedUpstream.name: packetsDiscardedUpstream

rtt.description: round-trip time from the site to the Cato Cloud
rtt.name: rtt

name.description: Link name in the Cato Management Application
name.name: name

periods.description: object that is a specific time duration
periods.name: periods

duration.description: An tuple of two numbers representing  start time, end time in ms since epoch, start bucket index, end bucket index
duration.name: duration

type.description:
Type identifies which annotation this is: e.g. connectivity, rolechange, missingdata, which allows
charts to attach to it.
type.name: type

enumValues.description: packet loss connectivity issue
enumValues.name: packetLoss

enumValues.description: missing data
enumValues.name: missingData

enumValues.description: interface in standby mode
enumValues.name: passiveLink

enumValues.description: traffic was seen
enumValues.name: active

enumValues.description: some packets were queued
enumValues.name: overlowed

enumValues.description: some packets were discarded after queue timeout
enumValues.name: congested

enumValues.description: multiple last mile destinations measured packet loss
enumValues.name: lastmilePacketLoss

enumValues.description: multiple last mile destinations measured large latency (greater than 500ms)
enumValues.name: lastmileLatency

enumValues.description: unspecified period type
enumValues.name: generic

enumValues.description: period connected to specific pop instance
enumValues.name: pop

remoteIP.description: IP address the ISP allocates to the WAN link
remoteIP.name: remoteIP

remoteIPInfo.description: Data related to the link IP address, such as country code
remoteIPInfo.name: remoteIPInfo

definition.description: A general structure to contain IP detailed information
definition.name: IPInfo

socketInfo.description: Data related to Socket and vSocket sites, such as serial number and Socket version. Applicable only for site
socketInfo.name: socketInfo

isPrimary.description: For HA configurations, when this boolean value is true, this the primary Socket
isPrimary.name: isPrimary

version.description: Software version number that is currently installed on the Socket
version.name: version

versionUpdateTime.description: Timestamp when the Socket upgraded to the current hardware version
versionUpdateTime.name: versionUpdateTime

enumValues.description: Total avg upstream traffic (from the site to the Cato Cloud)
enumValues.name: bytesUpstream

enumValues.description: Total avg downstream traffic (from the Cato Cloud to the site)
enumValues.name: bytesDownstream

enumValues.name: bytesUpstreamMax

enumValues.description: Total max downstream traffic (from the site to the Cato Cloud)
enumValues.name: bytesDownstreamMax

enumValues.name: lostDownstream

enumValues.description: Percent of packet loss for downstream traffic

enumValues.description: Percent packets discarded for downstream traffic
enumValues.name: packetsDiscardedDownstreamPcnt

enumValues.description: Jitter for upstream traffic (difference in time delay in milliseconds (ms) between data packets)
enumValues.name: jitterUpstream

enumValues.description: Jitter for downstream traffic (difference in time delay in milliseconds (ms) between data packets)
enumValues.name: jitterDownstream

enumValues.description: Total number of bytes of upstream and downstream traffic
enumValues.name: bytesTotal

enumValues.description: Round-trip time from the Socket to the Cato Cloud
enumValues.name: rtt

enumValues.name: health

enumValues.name: tunnelAge
